title: Vintage Canadian heritage brochure design
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103165701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/canadianheritagebrochure_6084.jpg)

Advertising brochure from the Canada North-West Land Company Limited publicizing town lots for sale in Western Canada c. the late 1800s. From [Library and Archives Canada](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103165701/http:/www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/trains/kids/021007-1060-e.html).
author: Meredith Ann Brooks

comments.content: Good stuff. For similar lettering (it really isn't a font, is it) see the Railway schedules and ads of the same period. The Grand Trunk had some beautiful stuff.
